name: Pumpkin Carving Salon Sim
description:
Halloween is here!You need to make a pumpkin lantern.
This fun pumpkin carving game is for you,in which you can carve out an unique pumpkin.
Now let's do it.Choose a pumpkin,wash it and create different Halloween pumpkins with variety of backgrounds,shapes,candy and others decorations.Show them for your friends.

Much fun hand making game for kids.
